title: Neverlonely
author: Neverlonely
content: Are you having to manually deploy your code?I will help you set up CICD pipelines with GitHub actions.(I will help you set up the deployment if you need that too for an additional 25$)I can set up the pipeline for a variety of applications, (nodejs, react applications, rust backend and everything in between) and environments (AWS, digital ocean, lenode even your own home server if you have one)Offer active for a limited time, before I get busy with other stuff.So let's get shipping!Payment options - PayPal, SOL.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: Neverlonely on June 17, 2022, 07:11:55 PMPayment options - PayPal, SOL.What SOL? Not Solana, right ?Hello Neverlonely and Welcome to bitcointalk forum.1) Why don't you provide further info about your career? A portofolio containing some of your previous works can help a lot. With a portofolio, your offer may get much more attention than what you've expected.2) This is a bitcoin forum, so you have to set bitcoin as main (or alternative) payment option for your service. You can also accept altcoins as a method of payment but in this case you will have to move your topic to the altcoin board.
